what is the most emmbarassing thing that has ever happened to you that you can or want to share?

post_info.post_title: most emmbarassing thing that has happened to you

OMG! I had a band Christmas concert, and I put down the music before it started and went somewhere and forgot to take my music.... so when it came time to play I coudnt find my music so I just played what I remembered (AKA: barely anything)

My freshman year of HS, I was the only person in my section present for the first marching band show of the year, and our section had a big part in the closing song. I had to play it as a solo and I totally messed it up.

i uesd to play the clarinet in my band and i was the best player that we had. so i got recommended for honor band which is like this huge huge big band thing that the best people from each school get to go to and for my auditon when they decided which group you would go in, i had a complete and total panic attack and forgot ALL my scales and couldn't site read worth XXXX. i was so mad and upset.
I love band (its like my whole life), but it sure can give you aa whole lot of embaressing time.
That's funny. Three posts, all dealing with band events.

Most embarrasing thing huh? Well, I would have to say in gym class in freshman year we were playing volleyball, and the net wasnt all the way put up yet. So, people (me included) were acting like XXXXXX and leaping over it. It was up pretty high mind you! Infront of my entire class as well as a sophomore class I leaped over the net catching and tangling both of me feet, and excelled face first into the groundn! Well....... whatever goes up must come down......emoticon_xbouncer

Here's something pretty embarassing:
 
 A bunch of friends and I were sitting around telling jokes one night and drinking hot chocolate. One of my friends said something really funny while I had hot chocolate in my mouth and I laughed so hard that it came out of my nose and sprayed everybody! I was sooooo embarassed! :p (It felt really gross coming out of my nose too.)

Speaking of liquid coming out the nose. I was at shool one day and I was REALLY hyper, and I had a glass of coke. Well where everybody goes after school my friend made me laugh so hard that it came out my nose and then I looked up and these really HOT high school guys were going EEEEWWWW! I was so embarrassed.

OMG, Don't you love it when you do something silly and there just happens to be a hot guy around? I was teasing this guy at the place I work at...... We were trying to hit eachother on the butts with note books.....I know it sounds silly, but we were having a good time, and i was tryin to be cute and flirt. lol I was trying to run away from him, and he was chasing, and I ran right into a wall.......yeah, you know I'm cute!!!!! Yeah you know now that I think about it........I don't have an embarrasing moment........I have like 30 of them!emoticon_xgood

when I was in first grade I wore this really pretty dress to school and on the way to music class I had to go to the bathroom so when I got up stairs to the music room I started talking to my teacher... I turned around to walk away... she pulled me back... she said "honey your skirt is stuck in your tights
 
 I HAD STUFFED M SKIRT IN MY TIGHTS I ALMOST CRIED!!! IT WAS SO EMBRASSING

once i was at a pool party for some younger kids and there was this guy i liked there too. my friend that was there with me decided to race each other to the trampoline and i was wearing flip-flops so i was watching me feet while i was running. i ran stright into a cloths line made out of wire and flew backwards. i cut my gums really badly and couldn't talk properly for the rest of the night even when my crush tried to talk to me. luckily we just laugh about it nowemoticon_xgood

well, this one time, at band camp...
 NO, I'm just kidding, I wasn't even in the band, but everybody else was talking about band, so I just had to add that.
 
 But when I was 7 years old two of my older brothers took me to a basketball game, and I had to go to the bathroom (real bad).
 They wouldn't let me go in the girls room, cause they were afraid that someone would steal me or something. So they made me go in the boys bathroom. They also told me that the stalls were broken so I had to go in the urinal! Well, I tried but as I was going, I kinda missed, and I peed all over my self. And when I looked up my brothers were nowhere to be seen. I had to walk out of the men's bathroom soaking wet and find my brothers, it was awful, and I'll never let them forget it!! EVER!! 
 especially when they are old and need help going to the bathroom, hehehe!!
oh god i have a BAD embarrassing moment well it is for me, i was talkin to the guy i really liked and i laughed and gushing of my nose came blood i got it on his shirt!!!! DAMN THE HUMDITY!!

that must have sucked a lot. i just had a really bad moment. i was wearing my boyfriend's sweatshirt all day and after gym, and at the end of the day he needed it back so i handed it back to him and went to this after school help thing for Algebra (it's not my best subject) and there were these three guys in the room there for the same thing and they had already convinced me it was tuesday instead of wensday and so i went around asking people what day it was. when i got back in the room the guys were still cracking up and so i kept standing up and looking at them. then one of them says you're fly is unzipped and i don't belive him. then the other to start saying the same thing and i try to be all cool and not look at them while trying to figure out if it was true. well it turned out they were right so i had to run to the bathroom before anyone saw me and zip up my pants. luckily the guys were not particularly hot, but i was really worried that they would go around telling everyone what had happened. so far so good, i haven't heard them say anything.

My friend was at a graduation party, and the people had a pool so she brought her swimsuit, swam got out and change, but for got to pack a bra, so she jsut put on her shirt and a sweatshirt over it, then she went over by her mom, while her mom was saying good bye to ppl her mom goes u should see her new swim suit AND LIFTED UP EVERYTHING!!!

I keep running in to people literally, like all the time. 
 
 Anywho, I went to this Christmas party thing for my youth group at church. We were playing pinyata, and it was my turn so they blind folded me and all that stuff. Then they spined me like 3 times. Well when they stopped me all the guys were like "turn around your facing the wrong way!" so i turned around and i strted swinging. well i didnt hit it so after i took my blind fold off, i was faced the opposite direction. I was so embarresed and EVERYONE, even my youth pastor was dying laughing. OMG....that still haunts me emoticon_frazzled

OMG Katie your kidding!!!!

SOOO not kidding im just happy it didnt happen to me lol
so are you guys going out now?
hmmm...the pee story, the avatar, the name squirt? maybe a little fetish with urine? perhaps therapy might help. your brothers seem to have scarred you very deeply. -jk
Okay Madisons post looks odd with mine not there any more so if ur confused i accidently deleted my posts...

ONE
 When I was about 15 my best friend said his parents were taking him to see a show for his birthday and he invited me along. There was a magician and some other acts at this club; a real family affair.
 
 Anyway, I sat across this table from his mum. During the night I got a really itchy foot. I slipped out of my shoe and began rubbing it against the leg of the table. Occasionally I looked at his dad and his mum and we all smiled at the magician's acts.
 
 Then I realised that it was his mum's leg that I was rubbing up against, not the table leg. She hadn't said a word the whole time!
 
 TWO
 In about 1991 Sydney still had trains with manual operated double doors. These were removed from service because they were too unsafe. I ran up the stairs at Central Station and saw one pulling out of the station. I hesitated, then decided to leap in through some doors that someone had left open. It was going too fast. I hit an internal wall, and bounced straight back out of the train and fell onto the platform, still holding my bag. I got up. People were just looking at me; no one offered to ask if I was alright. I left the platform and the station and walked to work instead. I know of no other person who can claim to have collided with a train. And this shows why these sorts of trains were removed.
 
 THREE
 When I was little; about 5, I used to like to climb trees. My neighbour was hanging out the washing in her backyard. I called out to her. She waved. I waved back, and fell. I ran into the house to my mum. She was mopping the kitchen floor. She wiped my tears away and then, to get me out of the way, she sat me on the window ledge. I leant against the fly-screen and it gave way. I feel head first about 6ft onto a brick footpath. I didn't even need stiches! I cried, but I was alright soon after.

post_info.post_title: These are signs of stupidity... and a thick skull

I was auditioning for a band. It's a pretty big audition. Like hundreds of guitarists try out for it.
 
 Anyways, I totally panicked. Forgot everything.... Yeah, they probably thought I never picked up a guitar in my life!
 
 It wasn't too embarrassing though. It's more depressing. I was upset. I'm sure the poster above me knows the feeling.....

It was like my second week of soccer (ever) and i was running to take a shot, and im going at full sprint about to take a shot, and bam i hit a pothole and just hit the ground face first... i looked like an idiot and the entire team laughed at me... luckily though i made the shot so the coach supported me :)

hmmm... most embarassing moment....
 It has to do with music and this one guy. (currently dating - beside the point) 
 Anywho, about 4 years ago....it was the school audition for the musical Charlie Brown. OK, if you know me, I can't carry a tune in a bucket. 
 I don't know who convinced me to audition (if I ever remember, I'll hunt them down), but audition I did. 
 By the time I got up on stage, my range had narrowed to a whopping 4 notes or something. I didn't hear me do it. I sure hope no one else did.
 Practically half the school was there, including this guy I'd been... well..... 'stalking'. (no, not leather gloves and video camera... Just a regular camera - all in good humor)
 The director decided to be nice and put me in pit orchestra. I thank her to this day.

Hmm, once plugged myself into the mains in Physics by accident, though that was more painful than embarassing. Probably walking in on my younger brother and his girlfriend while going to collect my computer from his room before heading back to Uni.
 
 Yeah, probably that or my love life. Pretty much all of it.

Oh - the list is long and frequently involves me falling on my ***. Once I was at a junkyard with the man of my dreams. He was carrying a car door for me so I ran ahead to open the door of the store for him and tripped on the step and landed on my face. Heck just a coupld of weeks ago I fell in a crowd of people. Could not tell you how. Three guys came to my rescue , though. When they asked if I was OK I told them "yep, I just feel stupid."
 
 Then there are the countless times I have stuck my foot in my mouth...
I locked my car, and then realized that I had left the engine on.

During a rehearsal for choir and band solos for districts, I saw my German song. I play a little piano so I practiced my solo. Unfortunately for me, I practiced two times faster than it should have been. In front of twenty people, I totally bombed it because it was slower. emoticon_frazzled 
 
 This one didn't happen to me but it was still pretty funny. During baseball practice we decided to play wiffle ball. One of the seniors on the team was up to bat, and he swung as hard as he could. He launched the bat across the whole gym and over the far bleachers. emoticon_smile

OK I have one
 one day I was riding my bike to school and I tried to get major air time by going into high grear0s and getting lots of speed to jump up the curb 
 then curb lip came up but I didn't turn hard enough and crashed into the sidewalk in front of the principal the kids on the school bus and in front of some cute girls I looked like such an IDIOT the principal stop and said "corey are you ok" of course she knows my name...weird huh anyway I was so emoticon_emb that I bailed infront of important people in the social status 
 
 but kids bounce back 
 
 
 emoticon_xbouncer

When I was on the Volunteer fire dept. I was running to the fire house for a call and my pants fell down and I had nothing on underneath. The thing of it was it was in a village and there were old Lady's sitting in lawn chairs and they saw me. Some them laughed and some were shocked. At that time I wished that I did not live by.

When I was in third grade, I thought I was pretty cool. One day I took my Snoopy thermos of milk, declared "This is how a man drinks" to my friends, and promptly poured the milk all over my face. I'm only now recovering! emoticon_emb

One
 At my high school, we were at this event called Walk Down Memory Lane, where on a big screen, they would show baby pictures of the seniors, and they also played music during the presentation. Well, the song was Hey ya and my friend Cait and I were sitting there watching the presentation, and people were clapping and singing with the music, but when the part came to the "Alright alright" part, they stopped singing-- except for Cait, who can't carry a tune in a dump truck. The music stopped as the intermission started, and everything was silent, except for her shouting, "Alright alright alright alright alright!" I was so embarassed to be sitting next to her.
 
 Two
 I went to Minnesota for a summer camp type thing for a month, and the camp did not let us go into town except for one day. Well, on our in town day, we stopped at a mall, and we all got to walk around and buy stuff, etc. Well, my friend Kandace and I went up to a dairy queen, and bought ourselves a big chocolate sundae thing. We sat down on a bench together (and mind you all, it had been about half a month since we both had had chocolate and ice cream.) and started to eat. The seat we had chosen was this really high backed thing with plants growing out of the top, and there was a bench on the other side. Well, Kandace and I didn't know that, so we were eating quite noisily, breathing heavily, groaning, the whole nine yards; and when I turned around, these two old people were looking at us from over the bench. Boy was my face red. emoticon_emb

... I ran ahead to open the door of the store for him and tripped on the step and landed on my face. Heck just a coupld of weeks ago I fell in a crowd of people. ...

 
 Reminds me of my favorite Far Side cartoon: Two aliens are standing on the platform of their spaceship, looking down at another one who just tripped walking down the steps and is sprawled face down on the ground in front of a crowd of earthlings. The one alien says to the other," Well, so much for filling them with awe".
Probably the "dressing room incident". Went to try on some pants, triped and fell out of the dressing room (it had a cutain for a door). emoticon_emb

o man! the same thing happend to me at hot topic ...they had like this cutain that u had to pin to both sides and i just thought it pinned to one..and i was trying on a dress so im half naked and i was trying to get the dress on and i like jumpped and on the way down tripped and went right through the curtain..it was a saturday and a lot of people were there ! it was terrible.

 I think she left in tears. emoticon_emb
